extension.summary: For Kodi 16: Create, view, edit and delete your advancedsettings.xml file in a user-friendly gui
extension.description: All settings follow the xbmc.org wiki[CR][CR]With this tool you can create your advanced settings directly from XBMC[CR][CR]If you don't know what a setting does, don't enable it!

extension.summary: Create, view, edit and delete your Kodi v17 advancedsettings.xml file in a user-friendly gui
extension.description: All settings follow the Kodi Wiki[CR][CR]With this tool you can create your advanced settings directly from Kodi[CR][CR]If you don't know what a setting does, don't change it![CR][CR]This is a fork of the Easy Advanced Settings, version 0.8.9 (Kodi v16 standard)
